about_the_game:
East Defense

Is a tower defense game that focuses on achieving a good balance between entertainment and challenge, being suitable for both hardcore and casual players who would love to either explore tower defense games style or challenge themselves against various waves of monsters by strategically placing and upgrading multiple towers to prevent the monsters from reaching the castle along the path!

Core game mechanics
  • Monsters will try to reach the castle, and you have to build and upgrade towers to prevent them from doing so.
  • There are various types of monsters, which you can learn more about as you encounter them in the game.
  • Each tower has a special skill to boost its power, which can be unlocked by upgrading the tower.
  • Winning each level without allowing any monster to reach the castle grants you 3/3 stars, which can be later used to unlock special levels with unique gameplay mechanics!


Towers
  • There are 10 tower types to use in the game.
  • Unlock towers' maximum potential by placing them in the optimum spot to make the most use of their power.
  • Each tower can be upgraded five times and has its own special skill unlocked.
  • Using a variety of towers is the key to defeating all types of monster waves. 


Monsters
  • Monsters aim to reach the castle in waves, each with its own speed and health.
  • Killing monsters grants you gold, which can be used to build and upgrade towers.
  • Each monster can have multiple traits to make it stronger and more dangerous.
  • On the 10th wave and every 5 waves, bosses will appear! And they are harder to defeat and will cause high damage to the castle if they pass through your defenses!

Don't wait anymore! Explore the wonderful world of East Defense and be the one to repeal all monster waves!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz (2 cores) or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.8Ghz (4 cores) or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
